entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
